text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.modules.de: This module removes the "Too Expensive!" tip on the anvil and keeps the penalty level on the item.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.modules.fi: This module fixes the blocks' outline shape and syncs it to the blocks' model.
This module fixes the zombie reinforcement and allows zombies and their variants to spawn clones of themselves, just like Minecraft 1.21.2 version does.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.modules.sy: This module syncs the IN_WALL property of the same row of fence gates and enables them to unify the heights affected by the IN_WALL property.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.title: Zakuro - Config
